name: Marinated Fresh Sardines With Pickled White Beans
keywords: appetizer, main course, dried white beans, extra virgin olive oil, italian parsley, lemon juice, sardines, thyme, kosher, low cholesterol
recipeIngredient: Freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 pound dry white beans, sorted, washed and soaked overnight and drained

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the sardines' heads and tails and split the fish. Remove the bones and lay the sardines in a large bowl. Mix together the lemon juice, olive oil, salt, pepper and parsley and pour it over the sardines. Chill for 5 hours.

Place the beans in a pot with cold water to cover by 2 inches. Add the garlic, onion, peppercorns, vinegar, olive oil and salt. Bring to a boil and simmer, covered, until very tender, about 40 minutes. Drain.
Refresh the beans under cold running water. Remove the peppercorns and stir in the lemon juice, extra-virgin olive oil and thyme. Arrange the sardines and beans on plates and serve.
